{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
void swap( std::basic_filebuf&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; lhs,
           std::basic_filebuf&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Overloads the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::basic_filebuf}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{lc|std::basic_filebuf}} objects whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
